summary: New Faction Hammer Set for Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
2/12/2013 Faction Hammer Set by Lord Banewrath Sunblade


      This mod adds new steel warhammers and mauls to the two factions in Skyrim. You have Imperial Warhammers and mauls
and you have the Stormcloak warhammers and mauls. Blacksmiths all across skyrim have a chance to sell these weapons.
They can also all be upgraded. Stormcloak Soldiers may carry these weapons as well as Imperial soldiers. Bandits
also have a chance of having these on them as well. The weapons are all comparable to steel in quality and price. If the mod does well I may decide to add some unique versions of the weapons to the mod that will be stronger then plain steel. But if you wanted the factions to have a slightly enchanced arsenal of lore friendly weapons, then this mod is for you.
 
I have a few other weapon mods too. Take a look, you may see something you like.

       Delete the previous mod. this is completely new.


   To install drag and drop the esp and bsa to your data folder and to uninstall delete the two files.


    You may not alter or use my models without permission. You may translate the mod to your language and upload it to
your national site if you wish.
author: Lord Banewrath Sunblade
